Kifayat Ullah

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/4048515554845604
  • Última atualização do currículo em 29/01/2016

I am a PhD Scholar at the Instituto de Ciências Matemáticas e de Computação (ICMC), Universidade de São Paulo (USP), Sao Carlos. I am working under the supervision of Prof. Dr. Edson dos Santos Moreira. My current research interests includes Vehicular Ad hoc Networks (VANETs), Opportunistic Communication, Big Data and Location Based Services. I did my MS (MPhil) in Computer Networks from KPK, Agricultural University, Peshawar, Pakistan in 2010. I did my Master (MSc) in Computer Science from Kohat University of Science & Technology, Pakistan in 2005, and received Bachelor degree in Computer Science from University of Peshawar, Pakistan in 2002. (Texto informado pelo autor)
